item.title: Recent Projects
item.description: Coq Probability Theory Library. (December 2023) TSA check-in prediction algorithm (co-developed) using gradient-boosted regression. Tech Stack: Kalshi API, Pandas, LightGBM (September 2023) WHPK.org. Built backend and implemented database and administrative functions for website, as well as dynamic scheduling features. Tech Stack: PHP, MySQL HTML/CSS/JS (February 2023)
